name: BoatMan
description:
Have you ever done kayaking on a rough mountain river all alone? Have you come face to face with the irresistible force of nature that drives all natural processes on Earth? If not, then BoatMan is the game for you, because it is in it that you can feel the full power of the unbridled water flow, feel all its wildness and cruelty, and, despite its gentle nature, still try to conquer it.

BoatMan is a 3-person runner with a top view in which you have to control a kayak that rushes through a stormy mountain river at breakneck speed! Dodge obstacles and pick up bonuses that will help you set a record and show all your friends that you are the number one in any river expanses!

Feature of game:
- Nice graphics.
- Easy control.
- Endless gameplay.
- Table of records.
